verses.verse: So they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H3322>set<s%> it in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for it: and they <S%H7126>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>sacrifices<s%> and peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>.

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H5927>offering<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and the peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>, he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And he <S%H2505>dealt<s%> to every <S%H376>one<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, both <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman<s%>, to every <S%H376>one<s%> a <S%H3603>loaf<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and a good piece of <S%H829>flesh<s%>, and a <S%H809>flagon<s%> of wine.

And he <S%H5414>appointed<s%> certain of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and to <S%H2142>record<s%>, and to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

<S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, and <S%H4932>next<s%> to him <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth<s%>, and <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%>, and <S%H4993>Mattithiah<s%>, and <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>, and <S%H5654>Obededom<s%>: and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> <S%H3627><s%> and with <S%H3658>harps<s%>; but <S%H623>Asaph<s%> made a <S%H8085>sound<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%>; with psalteries: Heb. with instruments of psalteries and harps

<S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> also and <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H7218>first<s%> this psalm to <S%H3034>thank<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.
Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>, make <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H5949>deeds<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto him, sing <S%H2167>psalms<s%> unto him, <S%H7878>talk<s%> ye of all his <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works.
<S%H1984>Glory<s%> ye in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>: let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength<s%>, <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> his <S%H6381>marvellous<s%> works that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>, his <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>;
O ye <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, his chosen <S%H972>ones<s%>.
He is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Be ye <S%H2142>mindful<s%> <S%H5769>always<s%> of his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>; the <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>;
Even of the covenant which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and of his <S%H7621>oath<s%> unto <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>;
And hath <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> the same to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>law<s%>, and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>,
<S%H559>Saying<s%>, Unto thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>; the lot: Heb. the cord
When ye were but <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H4962><s%>, even a <S%H4592>few<s%>, and <S%H1481>strangers<s%> in it. few, even: Heb. men of number, etc
And when they <S%H1980>went<s%> from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and from one <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>;
He <S%H3240>suffered<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> to do them <S%H6231>wrong<s%>: yea, he <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> for their sakes,
Saying, <S%H5060>Touch<s%> not mine <S%H4899>anointed<s%>, and do my <S%H5030>prophets<s%> no <S%H7489>harm<s%>.
<S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, all the <S%H776>earth<s%>; shew <S%H1319>forth<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>.
<S%H5608>Declare<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>; his marvellous <S%H6381>works<s%> among all <S%H5971>nations<s%>.
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised<s%>: he also is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> above all <S%H430>gods<s%>.
For all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H457>idols<s%>: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
<S%H1935>Glory<s%> and <S%H1926>honour<s%> are in his <S%H6440>presence<s%>; <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H2304>gladness<s%> are in his <S%H4725>place<s%>.
<S%H3051>Give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, ye <S%H4940>kindreds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3051>give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength<s%>.

<S%H3051>Give<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> due unto his <S%H8034>name<s%>: <S%H5375>bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him: <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H1927>beauty<s%> of <S%H6944>holiness<s%>.
<S%H2342>Fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: the <S%H8398>world<s%> also shall be <S%H3559>stable<s%>, that it be not <S%H4131>moved<s%>.

Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%>, and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice<s%>: and let men <S%H559>say<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4427>reigneth<s%>.
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%>, and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> thereof: let the <S%H7704>fields<s%> <S%H5970>rejoice<s%>, and all that is therein.

Then shall the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H3293>wood<s%> sing <S%H7442>out<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, because he <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for he is <S%H2896>good<s%>; for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H559>say<s%> ye, <S%H3467>Save<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, and gather us <S%H6908>together<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us from the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, that we may give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, and <S%H7623>glory<s%> in thy <S%H8416>praise<s%>.

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>. And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H543>Amen<s%>, and <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

So he <S%H5800>left<s%> there <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, as every <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H1697>work<s%> <S%H3117>required<s%>:

And <S%H5654>Obededom<s%> with their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%>; <S%H5654>Obededom<s%> also the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> and <S%H2621>Hosah<s%> to be <S%H7778>porters<s%>:

And <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the high <S%H1116>place<s%> that was at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%>,

To <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening<s%>, and to do according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; morning: Heb. in the morning, and in the evening

And with them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, and the <S%H7605>rest<s%> that were <S%H1305>chosen<s%>, who were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>, to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, because his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>;

And with them <S%H1968>Heman<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> for those that should make a <S%H8085>sound<s%>, and with <S%H7892>musical<s%> <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> were <S%H8179>porters<s%>. porters: Heb. for the gate
And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>: and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to <S%H1288>bless<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
